meanings.definition: A light four-wheeled carriage with two seats facing forward.
meanings.sent1: The family enjoyed a leisurely ride in the surrey around the park.
meanings.sent2: The surrey was a popular choice for picnics in the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The surrey driver told a joke that made everyone laugh during the ride.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a surrey, carrying memories forward with each turn of the wheel.
meanings.sent5: The bright red surrey stood out against the green landscape, a cheerful sight.

meanings.sent1: My friend visited Surrey last summer and loved the historic buildings.
meanings.sent2: Surrey is known for its beautiful gardens and quaint villages.
meanings.sent3: In Surrey, even the squirrels seem to have a posh accent!
meanings.sent4: Her love for Surrey was as deep as the roots of the ancient trees in the county.
meanings.sent5: The sunsets in Surrey painted the sky with colors only found in dreams.
